pr_title: [WFLY-14203] Move microprofile-config-smallrye to the microprofile feature-pack

timeline.message:
[WFLY-14203] Move microprofile-config-smallrye to the microprofile
feature-pack

JIRA: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-14203

Signed-off-by: Jeff Mesnil <jmesnil@redhat.com>

timeline.bodyText: I added them as it is required by JWT.
timeline.author: jmesnil

timeline.message:
[WFLY-14203] Move microprofile-config-smallrye to the microprofile
feature-pack

JIRA: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-14203

Signed-off-by: Jeff Mesnil <jmesnil@redhat.com>

[WFLY-14203] Move microprofile-config-smallrye to the microprofile
feature-pack

JIRA: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-14203

Signed-off-by: Jeff Mesnil <jmesnil@redhat.com>

timeline.bodyText: @ronsigal Could you please confirm that it is fine with resteasy if this module is not present?
timeline.author: jmesnil
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -47,6 +47,6 @@
         <module name="org.jboss.resteasy.resteasy-validator-provider" optional="true" services="export" export="true"/>
         <module name="org.jboss.logging"/>
         <module name="org.reactivestreams"/>
-        <module name="org.eclipse.microprofile.config.api"/>
+        <module name="org.eclipse.microprofile.config.api" optional="true"/>

replies.bodyText:
Hi @jmesnil,
Sorry for the late reply. I have believed that it would be fine, but I took another look at the code and it looks ok. I was going to run the WildFly testsuite to convince myself even further, but then I noticed that resteasy-jaxrs/main/module.xml in RESTEasy is
    <dependencies>
        ...
        <module name="org.eclipse.microprofile.config.api" export="true" optional="true"/>
    </dependencies>

so, there's the answer. It's fine.
replies.author: ronsigal
